website_summaries.verdict: If you don't like fiddling with powders or granules, this oxy-charged spray-on litter box deodorizer can make life a little easier.
pros: Oxygen-powered formula locks onto molecules to neutralize smells at the source
Works to lift litter box odors during cleaning and as an everyday solution
Non-clumping for mess-free use in between cleans
Light scent doesn't seem to bother cats or pet parents
cons: Skittish kitties might be alarmed by the sound of a spray bottle

customer_reviews.title: Works so well I got two bottles afterward!
customer_reviews.text: I was purchasing Skout's Honor litter spray until I ran their Amazon listing through Fakespot, and decided against using them again once they ran out. So, the search was on for a new spray to replace it.. and this one fit the bill. I got one bottle and used it - had no trouble with the cats, and it wasn't as strong as the cat litter deodorizing powders I was using from Arm & Hammer. Happy cats + not-so-smelly litterbox = happy cat parents. Now if they would have a solution for the bombs they drop in the litterbox...
customer_reviews.author: miznic

customer_reviews.title: Great to clean the yucky cat box!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Litter Maid for multiple cats, had it for awhile (irritates me but that is for another review) but I needed something to really clean the rake, scoops and other areas where cat feces collects or gets deposited where it shouldn't. Most sprays have a fragrance that doesn't cover up the smell but "combines with it", so now it smells like lemony poop! This Simple Solution spray really cleans and gives the areas cleaned a pleasant "clean" smell, what a concept! Wish they had it in a gallon concentrated jug--I'd buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ck1975

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product! A must for anyone with a litter box!!!
customer_reviews.author: nsb

customer_reviews.title: Helping with kitty poop odor
customer_reviews.text: I normally scoop my cat boxes 3 to 4 times a day. I have 5 cats, 2 boxes. I try to keep the smell down of course and it's best for the cats. So if a cat just pooped, I scoop it and I will spray some of this on the litter to help get rid of some of the lingering smell. It's lightly scented, which is nice not being overly powerful and perfumed. You can spray it right on the clumping litter and it won't clump.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Calcula

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product does clean the cat box or the scooping spoon easily. However I don’t feel it deodorizes the litter after scooping as much as I thought it would. The scent is okay but again not as fresh as I thought. I would recommend this product though as it does clean really well once you spray it on and let it sit for a few minutes, even hard crusted on debris.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: No Litter Odor
customer_reviews.text: This is such an easy and effective solution to cat litter odor. I spray it directly on the cat litter -- once every three days -- and odor is eliminated. Great for someone living with a kitten in a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader Black

customer_reviews.title: Great odor eliminator!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product, not overpowering and reduces kitty litter smells on contact. I’ve got 3 cats and three boxes, this is a great product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: B. Aholt

customer_reviews.title: Great light scent
customer_reviews.text: Great light scent but maybe could be more powerful. If you use too much it forms a thin crust on litter, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sugaard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but knocked off a star because the scent is stronger than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: 3Catzzz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cover up odor, only seems to add a bit of additional scent to the cat box odor. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Too Mild
customer_reviews.text: The scent is so mild I noticed little to no change in the litter box
customer_reviews.author: Stan5409

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and makes a huge difference with litter box odors.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D

customer_reviews.title: No bad smell so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago, and so far it has done a great job at masking the bad smell. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Shahin Saadati

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to clean my cats litter pan and it does a wonderful job...
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a defective bottle but this stuff did absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Henson

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: A couple sprays and the smell goes away seriously. It’s worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Shinny santiago

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a spray bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical, whenever I clean out my cat’s litter box, I’ll spay this in there let it sit for 5 - 10 minutes and it’s like the litter box is brand new! No smell, no stains!
customer_reviews.author: shannon Adeleye

customer_reviews.title: Fresh-smelling litter spray
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product and have been using it for years without complaint. Our littler box is in our main living room which makes it imperative that it not get super smelly and we use this spray after each time we clean the litter box. The cats have never refused the litter box after spraying this product on, and it does provide a nice fresh scent after cleaning which isn’t overwhelming but also doesn’t seem last particularly long. The packaging has recently been redesigned, which has resulted in a finer, more even spray which is great. The fine spray mists the top of the litter without causing any clumping.
customer_reviews.author: cubuffgirl

customer_reviews.title: It eliminates odor and my cat doesn't mind it
customer_reviews.text: This spray works exactly as advertised. The scent is light and fresh, my cat doesn't mind it at all. I usually spray it once on top of the litter when my cat is done with his business. This does get rid of the lingering smell from urine and feces. I also use it to clean the litter box from time to time. This spray smells so much better than other ones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Chidori

customer_reviews.title: This deodorizer DOES work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pellet based litter system and I’ve tried a few other brands and styles of deodorizers. I did not have luck with other options. Fortunately this one works very very well. Even the most sensitive nose in the house (my son) does not smell anything. And our cat does not seem to be bothered at all! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Good but sprayer clogs every time
customer_reviews.text: It works very well but I have NEVER had a bottle that the sprayer didn't clog. It even clogs different sprayers from different bottles. I wind up pouring it out. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: No One Ever

The Oxy Charged formula bonds with cat urine at a molecular level, changing microscopic particles into odorless compounds. This clump-free spray is great for daily use, leaving your house smelling fresh and clean all day long. Safe to use around your children and pets when used as directed.
